snippet: Crimean and Russian officials cite the independence of Kosovo to justify secession, but even Kosovo has struggled to gain international legitimacy.

byline.contributor: Victor Homola contributed reporting from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: Crimean and Russian officials cite the independence of Kosovo to justify secession, but even Kosovo has struggled to gain international legitimacy.

headline.main: For Crimea, Secession Is Only as Good as Recognition
headline.print_headline: For Crimea, Secession Is Only as Good as Recognition
